<h3 id="X38156">X(38156) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(4), X(8), X(11)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^7-8*(b+c)*a^6+(b^2+26*b*c+c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(11*b^2-34*b*c+11*c^2)*a^4-2*(7*b^4+7*c^4+2*b*c*(b^2-11*b*c+c^2))*a^3+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+14*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(9*b^2-22*b*c+9*c^2)*a-5*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38156) = X(4)+2*X(3036) = 4*X(5)-X(1317) = 4*X(10)-X(24466) = X(11)+2*X(355) = 5*X(11)-2*X(12737) = 5*X(80)+X(5531) = X(80)+5*X(37714) = 2*X(80)+X(37725) = X(119)-4*X(18357) = 5*X(355)+X(12737) = 2*X(1387)+X(5881) = 2*X(5531)-5*X(37725) = X(7972)-7*X(7989) = 5*X(8227)-2*X(12735) = 2*X(12019)+X(12751) = 3*X(21154)-4*X(38133) = 3*X(23513)-2*X(38044) = 10*X(37714)-X(37725) = 3*X(38099)-2*X(38128) = 3*X(38099)-4*X(38177)</b>
<p>X(38156) lies on these lines: {1,5}, {4,3036}, {10,24466}, {30,38099}, {515,21154}, {516,38211}, {518,38152}, {519,38038}, {528,5817}, {944,6667}, {971,38202}, {1145,6246}, {1376,6950}, {1503,38192}, {1537,15863}, {2800,5927}, {2802,38155}, {2829,14647}, {3035,5818}, {3091,12531}, {3617,10724}, {4188,12114}, {5603,34717}, {5657,11826}, {5731,17566}, {5790,5840}, {5842,38215}, {5843,11545}, {5844,38141}, {5846,38147}, {5848,38144}, {5851,38149}, {5853,38159}, {5854,11235}, {5855,38163}, {5856,38154}, {6224,20400}, {6713,18525}, {6797,9947}, {6826,12763}, {6893,13274}, {6913,10087}, {6918,10074}, {9956,31235}, {10165,17619}, {10172,17614}, {10175,34123}, {10738,13996}, {10914,14740}, {12736,14872}, {16174,25416}, {17613,28172}, {28204,38032}, {28224,34126}, {28236,32557}</p>
<p>
X(38156) = midpoint of X(16173) and X(37712)<br>
X(38156) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (21154, 34122), (34123, 10175), (38032, 38182), (38038, 38161), (38128, 38177)<br>
X(38156) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (5587, 38138, 38157), (6797, 9947, 12665), (15863, 19925, 1537), (38038, 38161, 38077), (38128, 38177, 38099)<br>
</p>
